Text: Final Fantasy Mystic Quest, released as Mystic Quest Legend in PAL regions and as Final Fantasy USA: Mystic Quest (ファイナルファンタジーUSA ミスティッククエスト , Fainaru Fantajī Yū Esu Ē Misutikku Kuesuto ) in Japan, is a role-playing video game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System.
